=== Woo Out Of Stock Products ===
Contributors: amg26, amgxyz, ryanvaness, jvalcq, Orion Group LLC
Tags: woocommerce, out of stock, product, woocommerce product, sold out, out of stock product, woo out of stock
Donate link: andrewgunn.xyz
Requires at least: 3.0
Tested up to: 4.5.3
Stable tag: 2.1
License: GPLv2 or later
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Dynamically display a custom uploaded or default "Out of Stock" image overlay for products in your WooCommerce store that are out of stock.

== Description ==

Now your WooCommerce products that are out of stock can be distinguished from in stock products with a dyanmically applied image overlay to all product images that are out of stock. You can use the preloaded pictures included in the plugin, or upload and set your own on the plugin settings page.


== Installation ==
Either upload a .zip file, or install through the WordPress.org repository.

1. Full Screenshot
2. Single product
